attributes.additional_details:
Make Joseph Kony Famous.

Joseph Kony, leader of the Ugandian guerrilla group the Lord's Resistance Army is the head of a violent campaign in the country which invovles child abduction, mutilation and murder. He has abducted an estimated 66,000 children to fight under him for over 26years. He is currently the world's most wanted man.

This petition asks to "make Kony famous" in 2012. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y4MnpzG5Sqc
